comm: starts with a back of a length on middle stump which shapes away on the pads as this is tickled through long leg by Tamim
reaches out to this back of a length which slants towards the off side, as this one is played away to point
full, swinging delivery on the pads which is flicked away towards long leg, but reined in before the boundary
gets forward to this fuller length outside of off
gets some inswing to this length delivery on and around off which curls in as Tamim presented the blade
fends away this length delivery towards the off side behind square
and right away he gets some purchase as this one swings away well outside of off, with the left-hander playing at it as it went over to the keeper
beautiful length outside of off which shapes away as the batsman has a go, but is late on it. That is the spot, Boult, that is it.
now experiments with a fullish length delivery well wide off the off stump, with the batsman getting in a stride, but not flirting with it in the end
this is swing bowling of the highest order as he now gets this back of a length to just nip away as Imrul presented the bat
slips in the full delivery on and around off which is dug away towards the off side by the batsman
gets his line wrong as he looked for the outswinging yorker-length delivery, with this one landing on the pads as Imrul tried to flick it away, but is unable to get a hold of it
bowls a beauty, slanting across on a slightly back of a length, as Tamim is drawn forward
delivers a fiery, inswinging yorker on and around middle which has Tamim tipping over like the Titanic
length delivery outside of off which curls in as Tamim shouldered arms. Really bent in as it made its passage to the keeper
delivers this one on a back of a length, and a bit further across Tamim, as he lets this one through
searching for that inswinging yorker once more, but this time it is a touch shorter, and more leg-side, as this is flicked away through backward square
tries to get in a drive through long on to this full, swinging delivery delivered on and around off. Ends up meeting the boot of Southee
fuller length, outside of off, which shapes away as this is defended away streakily to the slips
stays on the front foot as Boult deliver a wide, swinging delivery which is taken by the keeper behind

and NZ were almost in business there as Boult draws an outside edge to this back of a length, which lands just short of Taylor at first slip. Can't really call it a dropped chance, but he was sitting in a rather deep position there
this time gets away the drive, but is stopped by a low, diving stop by gully to his right
shimmies down a touch before punching away this shortish length outside of off to the man at point
sends in another full, swinging delivery well wide of off which is collected by Ronchi
pitched up outside off as Kayes goes for a big drive, but mistimes it to mid-off
full delivery slanting well across the batsman, as he allows it to go through
defends this length delivery on and around middle to mid-on
another one which just falls short of the slip as Southee sends in a bouncer which surprises Imrul as he fends this away to second slip, who is unable to get to it before the bounce
full, inswinging delivery on leg which shapes away as Imrul fails to get away the clip

full delivery outside of off, and swinging in, as this is defended away towards the covers, with the close-in fielder picking it up nicely to fire in a throw at the non-striker's, but misses in the end
length delivery outside of off which is defended away by the batsman
full delivery, outside of off, which is dead-batted away towards point

the dots are beginning to show as he dances down the track to try and throw Boult off his length, but the bowler saw him come early, delivering a short ball in response which the batsman was unable to attack

classic set-up from Boult. Rocked him with a shorter one earlier, before sending in this length ball which does too much for Imrul as it goes through the gate to knock back his off peg. Ends a torturous stay at the crease for Imrul, who I suspect would be happy to get back to his seat in the pavilion!
sends in his welcome to Sarkar with a length delivery which just nibbles away as Sarkar presented the bat

full delivery, on and around off, which shapes away as Sarkar drills this to point, who dives to his left to claim it, before firing in a throw to Sarkar, who was almost halfway down before he successfully grounded his bat before the throw
able to get away this clip to this fullish length on the pads, with this one pulled back in the deep at square-leg
nicely forward to this fuller length which ends up near mid-off
weaves away from this bouncer on middle and off. Umpire Kumar calls it one for the over
gets the line wrong to this fuller delivery which bends away on leg, as this is flicked down to the man at long leg
just gets away with this streaky shot that gets a leading edge. This one hared in on middle, and looked to have him, before he got this away through third man
this time fires outside of off, with Tamim not interested in engaging
back of a length which bends away as this is defended by the batsman on the off side
back of a length and nipping away outside of off as the angle of the delivery drew the batsman into the push

shuffles over to the off side before Boult delivered this, before the natural swing away, and a leading edge of the bat, sent this one over the off side at backward point. This almost threatened to reach the rope, but is pulled back before the boundary with a dive. Should mention those are the first runs of Boult's bowling today
the floodgates have opened! full delivery on the pads which is sent away in a hurry to the fine leg boundary by Tamim
driven hard to the man at extra-cover, but is stopped by the fielder in the circle
down the wicket and another sliver of luck is afforded to Bangladesh as the ball deviates away from the flashing blade
bangs in a short one on middle and leg which is avoided at all costs
full, almost half-volley, on off which is driven sweetly to the long off boundary. Not even the Bazinator could get to it, despite turning on the jets
sends in another full delivery which Sarkar heaves over to the long on boundary now. Southee looking a bit tired..
this time shortens the length as he fires in the cross-seam delivery which nips away to Ronchi
on the front foot and defended towards the off side by the batsman
short of a length and allowed to fly through outside of off to the keeper
fuller delivery, outside of off, which shapes away a touch as it flew through to the keeper
sends in a leg-side, full delivery which is flicked away through backward square, beating the fielder at long leg quite comfortably
reverts to his fourth stump line outside of off, with this just nipping away on its way to the keeper
gets it in a bit tighter to Tamim now, and this time succeeds in drawing the edge as this is claimed by second slip. Looked like he was just getting away there, but he has to go.

McCullum had put in a deepish short leg and silly mid-on, with this flick from the batsman flying just to the left of the outstretched hand of short leg. Guptill was the man there. Wonderful field set here by Baz
gets this one completely wrong down the leg side as the umpire gets a chance to stretch his arms
glances away this slightly back of a length, slanting on the pads, towards the close-in fielder on the leg side
gets nicely behind this back of a length on middle stump
dropped Southee almost gets his first as this hard flash from Mahmudullah bursts through the hands of Corey Anderson at second slip. Tough chance, but you would expect this NZ unit to pull them off
sensibly defends this length delivery from the bowler
length delivery, just outside off, as this nips away as he played at the ball. Wonderful delivery from Southee, who really deserves a wicket, just for the effort and skill on display
slings in a fuller one on middle and leg which is clipped away through fine leg
low, full toss just outside of off which is French cut by Soumya to race away to the fine leg boundary. Bangladesh will be pleased with that result in the end
tries to attack this fuller length going across him through the covers, but ends up miscuing to the leg side
full delivery, going down leg, as the batsman is late on it
length delivery on middle which bends in enough to rap the pads, with the bowler going up for it, but the angle suggests this was always going down
gets away a single through midwicket to get off the hot seat
length outside of off which Sarkar shrewdly slices over the slips to find the vacant third man boundary. This one just fell short of being a six
tries out the attempted yorker, which turns into a half-volley, that is eased away on the leg side

bangs in a short ball loosener outside of off which is crashed away to the deep extra-cover boundary. McCullum races after this, getting in a roll just before the rope, but he had his shoulder on the skirting when he tried to do that. Almost did in his shoulder there as he got up slightly delicately from the scene
shortish length on leg stump, and swinging away, as they are able to get away a quick single on the leg side
back of a length which is worked away towards cover, with the opportunity for a single there initially, before hesitation on the part of the batsman nipped that it in the bid
drives away this length delivery going across through the covers. Brings Bangladesh to their fifty
on the front foot as Sarkar leans into a drive square off the wicket to beat the converging fielder from third man to the boundary
shortish length, well wide of off, as this is slapped away through the covers to keep Sarkar on strike
back of a length which is fended away towards the mid-off region

goes after this fuller, swinging delivery, outside his off stump, with this one getting away streakily through the gap at gully to find the third man boundary. Not a convincing stroke, but four runs all the same
short now, and pulled away, but not in full control, through backward square
classy cover drive from Mahmudullah which is sent away through extra-cover, with McCullum going full tilt after it, but he was unable to rein it in

third boundary of the over as Boult feeds him a length delivery, slanting across, which is finessed past gully to find third man once more. Boult not bowling to his field at the moment. Really positive counter-attack from Bangladesh
back of a length now which is angled away through the slips, but is pulled back before the rope
flights one in on middle and leg which is turned away on the on side
tries to force this one away off the back foot, but is held by the short mid-on
looks to guide a single past backward point, but fails to do so
driven away now square off the wicket for one
darted in on and around off as this is defended away by the batsman
on the back foot as this is fended back to the bowler in his follow through
reaches out to this fuller length delivery, well wide of off and swinging away, as this is inside-edged towards deep fine leg
length delivery on middle and leg which is tickled away through fine leg
sends away this length delivery from Corey through backward point
looks to drive this one through the off-side, but hits this one straighter to mid-off
punches away a single through the covers to keep the strike
defends this one away outside of off to bring on drinks to the field
helps himself to a single down long on
content to get on the front foot and defend this one away on the off side
looks to steer one down through long on for another comfortable single
tries to force this one past the fielder at mid-on, but can't get it through
now cut away towards point, but the fielder is more than equal to the task
jabs away this shorter length through the covers
fires in a full delivery, outside of off, as this is dug away to the off side
gets this one to jag in from a back of a length as it went across the batsman. With this one going in between the bat and stumps
elects to leave this wide delivery going past outside off
fails to get away this attempted push through the covers
tries to steer away a single through backward point, but Kane bosses that region so superbly, getting to this in a flash
given width to drive this elegantly through the covers, but can't beat the fielder at sweeper cover
delivers this one on a fuller length, outside of off, as this is glided away through gully
finds his spot outside of off, with some movement away from the bat as Sarkar offered the drive
shorter one which is duck under by the batsman
full delivery which is struck away to the man at mid-off
gets away with this tight single on the leg side as he dead-batted this back of a length outside of off. The early call from Mahmudullah made it possible
short delivery which is pulled away competently to the man at deep midwicket on the bounce
just pushes away at this back of a length to find the fielder at mid-off
dug in short as Mahmudullah wanted to pull initially, but then weaved his head away from the line of the ball
defends this back of a length away to the off side
defended away on the front foot by Mahmudullah
is late on this shortish length banged in across him, as he looked to pull this away through midwicket
full delivery, going across, as this is driven away through to deep point
goes round the wicket as he shuffles down to hammer this length delivery through long on. Beats the dive from mid-on, but is unable to get it all the way to the boundary
now pulls this slightly shorter length towards deep midwicket
looks to crash away this back of a length pitched outside of off, but finds the man at cover
is well late on this back of a length delivered just outside off, with this one flying past the outside edge to the keeper
back of a length and turned away for a run on the leg side
low, full toss which is directed away to the mid-on fielder, with Mitch finishing his delivery stride with a roll. Mahmudullah, though, was not amused
looks to get away a single on the leg side, but can't find the space
this time is able to pierce the gap to get to the other end
rocks forward before helping this one with the drift down fine leg
opts for the late cut outside his off stump, but finds the slip in place
now cut away with some style through backward point
darts one in on middle and leg which is negotiated away through the leg side off the back foot
tries to run this back of a length outside his off stump through third man, but Anderson does well to come round on the boundary edge to intervene
pushes at this fuller length slanting in from the round-the-wicket angle, but picks out mid-off soon after
turns away this back of a length through fine leg
fires in the attempted yorker, this one landing outside of off, as Sarkar got low to dig it out
shuffles over to the off side in an attempt to re-direct this back of a length through the leg side, but doesn't quite get it away
short ball which Sarkar's aggressive instincts had him reaching for the ramp as an option, before calmer heads prevailed in the end
tries to work away Vettori through the leg side, but ends up getting a slight leading edge
clips away through the leg side now for a single
worked away through midwicket for a run
gets on the front foot before working this one away tentatively on the leg side
given plenty of flight as this seemed to take forever to arrive to the batsman, before he pushed that away to the off side
works one away through the leg side now to end the over
Bangladeshi fans, you can thank me later. gets away this slog over long on to this back of a length, with Bangladesh raising their 100 in the process
continues from round the wicket as this shortish length is crashed away to extra-cover
sends in the bouncer which flies through with good carry off the deck
another short delivery which is duck under by the left-hander
walks across the stumps before lifting this fuller one outside of off through long on. Clever shot as he was expecting the fuller delivery after the bumper the previous ball

gets the edge of the bat to this short of a length outside of off, but this one lands short of Ronchi as he went forward to take it. Replays confirm, however, this one came off the elbow, so safe in the end for Bangladesh
Mahmudullah defends this one off the back foot
eases away a single now on the leg side
easy as you like as he helps himself to a single through third man with a late cut
on the front foot and defended by the batsman quite resolutely
now turns one away through the midwicket region to get to the other end
works away this one drifting in across him to the fella at long off
begins with a gentle length delivery outside of off which is allowed to carry through

gets a leading edge to this fullish length shaping in on middle, with the ball almost getting to the backward point boundary, before Boult, who was making the sliding dive, scoops this one up to the third man fielder to fire in the throw
eases away a single on the leg side to get to the other end
attacks this back of a length going across him, with this one flying over through the third man

and Sarkar reaches a maiden ODI fifty against one of the best ODI outfits going, and in a big, big match for his country at a World Cup. Take a bow, Soumya. Has been a wonderful hand. Gets to the milestone by working away the bowler through the covers
pitched up outside off as Mahmudullah gets forward to defend, with the ball going to point
gets away with this late cut outside his off stump as this falls a couple of paces from the deep slip
turns away a single on the leg side to get off the strike
able to clip this one away through midwicket to bring Soumya back on strike

comes down the ground to try and deposit Vettori over long on, but ends up getting a bottom-edge which lands to Anderson in the region, who takes it safely. Ends a really special knock from the No.3. Didn't really need to go for it, but perhaps the milestone had him lose his concentration just momentarily

plenty of flight as Mahmudullah gets away a single on the leg side. This one came quickly to the mid-on fielder, who is able to get to it before firing in a throw at the non-strikers. Guptill was the man who struck down the stumps, but replays confirm that Mahmudullah was able to just get across. And after all that confusion, Mahmudullah is able to raise his bat to back up his century from the previous innings, with a fifty here
just works away the bowler on the off side to end the over
begins from round the wicket as he fires in a full delivery which just rushes past the attempted drive of Mahmudullah
this time a touch shorter in the same channel, and this time Mahmudullah is able to lace this through the covers for a boundary. Was really graceful as he executed the stroke
just punches away this back of a length outside of off to the close-in fielder
once again looks to force away through the covers, but it doesn't quite come off for him
able to dig out this full, inswinging delivery as this one squirts away through the leg side
steers away this fuller length, well wide of off, with this one finding the man at sweeper cover
steers away a single through the mid-on region quite comfortably
squared up a bit by the turn on offer from Vettori
unable to do any more than fend this away to the leg side
content to just defend this close to the body
now looks to force away a drive through long on, with Vettori attempting a catch-and-bowled, but the ball flew past his outstretched hands
shuffles back before helping this one a bit shorter on middle and leg through fine leg
sends in a back of a length which looks to have been glanced by the batsman to the keeper, but Kumar rules it not out
negotiates this back of a length, back to the bowler in his follow through
length delivery which jags back enough to hover over the middle and off stump peg as Mahmudullah played this with the intention of getting it away through midwicket
nicely met on the front foot to this slightly back of a length angling in from outside of off
covers the line of this back of a length outside his off stump
shoulders arms to this length delivery outside of off which gets good carry to the keeper
dispatches this loosener on the pads through deep midwicket, before Vettori's flat throw keeps them to just the two
eases away a run now behind of square
comes down the track to this length delivery going across, but ends up in a position where he couldn't go after it, with this one continuing through to the keeper
pulls away this shortish length through square-leg
on the back foot as he defended this length delivery from Anderson
short ball which is pulled into the ground towards deep midwicket
given a bit of with outside his off stump as Shakib drills this behind of square for a boundary. Powerful stroke there from the allrounder that beat point with ease
defends away this length delivery outside his off stump

cuts away this short ball outside off powerfully through third man, with Mitch putting in the hard yards before flinging at the ball with a dive that just avoids the ball from reaching the boundary rope. Excellent fielding effort which is applauded by everyone at the ground and the bowler
able to steer away a single through mid-on
gets well under this bouncer from Boult that just flies to Ronchi at great pace
goes round the wicket for the final delivery as Mahmudullah fails to get his bat on this fuller length outside off which shapes away
Shakib lucky to get away this mistimed stroke that flies behind through third man. Was looking to attack the covers
now gets away a miscued pull through midwicket, with this one pulled in before the rope
slaps away this back of a length outside of off through the backward point region for a single
whips away a single now behind of square on the leg side

slams this back of a length straight to Baz at mid-off, who, unbelievably, doesn't reach for it as he looks to have lost this in the sun, with the ball passing by him unknowingly to the cow corner fence
delivers a wide which is penalised by the umpire

Shakib, who had a cheeky smile with his partner after getting away with the previous ball, now has to go after attempting to connect with this back of a length that was shaping away outside of off, with this catching the outside of his bat to fly to Ronchi for a simple take
picks out a single through long on
defended off the back foot to this one sliding in on middle
darts one in from outside of off, with this one worked away through the covers
looks for the powerful slog-sweep behind of square, and gets it as he timed this one superbly to land in the stands. Calculated risk which comes off to perfection for Mahmudullah
now punches away Vettori through long off to get off the strike
turns away a single now through square-leg to end the over
shoulders arms to this back of a length delivery which shaped in as it went across
ends up miscuing this attempted drive back to the bowler in his follow through
shortish length which is fended away softly on the off side
shortish length which is just about fended away by the batsman, albeit unconvincingly
saw him giving the charge before pushing this a bit wider outside the off stump, with Mushfiqur unable to reach at it
guilty now of straying down the pads as the umpire swivels to signal the scorers
works away this delivery going across him to the off side
punched away through the covers for an easy single
darts in a quicker one, outside of off, which the batsman was unable to quite get to as he looked to cut
tries to get this one past the man at point, but to no avail
drills this fuller one landed outside off to the man at long off
rocks back to pull this one through midwicket, with Guptill flying to the wrong side at silly mid-on as he attempted to catch this. Finds the boundary with ease following the blunder
defends this final ball from Vettori who leaves slightly frustrated after Guptill debacle the previous ball
tries to force away a stroke on the off side to this back of a length, but is unable to get it away
looks to steer this shortish length past point, but is unable to

comes down the track to try and bludgeon Anderson straight down the ground, but instead gets a bottom-edge, with McCullum racing after it before putting in the dive at the last moment, but is unable to quite get to it
now drops the length a touch as Mushfiqur is able to squeeze this one away through the gap at backward point to pickup a boundary
defended away by the batsman
works away a single through the third man region
looks to get away Vettori through midwicket, but is unable to do so
now looks to dab through third man, but is held by backward point
drifts this down the pads as this sweep finds leg slip behind
now attacks this delivery drifting on leg with a powerful sweep that races away to the deep midwicket rope
now comes down to drill this one to long off
cut away square off the wicket as this one ends up near third man
fuller length which is struck back to the bowler in his follow through
was looking to come down and ramp the bowler over the slips, but ends up offering a feeble edge as the ball came at him slower than he had expected, with Ronchi taking this from behind gleefully
length delivery outside of off which is allowed through to the keeper
swinging delivery on middle and leg which is tickled behind to fine leg
full, swinging delivery outside of off which is drilled to the man at long off
short of a length which is defended close to the body by the batsman
punches away this back of a length going across to mid-off
flicks this length delivery on middle stump round the corner for a brace
beautiful sound off the bat as Mahmudullah connected sweetly with this shortish length that is sent high over long leg with a pull. Has been quite exquisite today
defends this length delivery to the man at mid-off
inside-edges this length delivery on and around off, and slanting across the batsman
driven sweetly through long off to end the over
back of a length and fended away softly on the off side
flashes at this back of a length delivery going across, but can't make the connection he sought
driven away on the up through the covers for a single
slips in the fuller delivery which goes across the batsman. Ends up being allowed through to the keeper
miscues this attempted heave over long on, with this one slowing up just outside of the ring
defends away this fuller one on and around off stump
picks up a drop-and-run single on the off side
brings up the Bangladesh 200 with a straight drive to this full delivery on off stump, with this one racing away to the long on boundary
now a bit of width given as this is slapped away hard through the backward point region to bring up four more
attacks this fuller one outside of off and nibbling away, with the keeper collecting this in the end
spears in the yorker on off stump which is just dug away by Sabbir as this ends up continuing through the third man region for a boundary. Just no luck for Southee today
slower, back of a length delivery which Sabbir just fends over the off side
goes after this length delivery going across, lifting this high over extra-cover, but not getting enough on it for it reach the boundary
defends away this length delivery towards the off side
slams away this length delivery through midwicket, with Boult, at the last second, pulling a Groucho, as he slipped just before the ball came to him to let it get across the boundary
now scythes away through the covers to move to 93. Really has been a special knock today from Mahmudullah
inswinging yorker on middle which is dug out successfully by Sabbir
bowls a lovely, slow back-of-a-length delivery which Sabbir throws his hands through quickly
pitched up, but wide of off, as this one is drilled to extra-cover
stand and deliver from Sabbir as he just tonks this shortish length back over long on for a huge six
goes round the wicket now as he dishes up a full toss which is swatted away through long on, beating the dive from mid-on to get to the rope in a hurry
short and going across as this is crashed away to deep extra-cover
forces away a drive on the off side, with the close-in fielder picking this up and firing in a throw at the non-striker's, which the batsman would have made even if the ball had struck the stumps
tries to reach out to this fuller delivery going across him, but ends up hitting it straighter towards long off
pitches it up just outside of off as this is worked away through long off
slow yorker on middle which is read early enough by the batsman to turn away a single on the leg side. Also brings up the fifty-run stand
picks up a boundary through third man thanks to the extra width afforded by Boult, with this one slicing high over the region
now picks up a single through the leg side to get off the strike
gets forward to this slow, full delivery on and around off
another attempted yorker which is eased away through midwicket to end the over
pitches it up outside of off as this one is worked down to long  on. Moves him to 98

dropped looking for the bludgeon over long off, but miscues this attempt to hit it more towards Southee, who was wide of the position. He comes forward before offering his right hand to try and clutch this inches from the ground

Mahmudullah scores back-to-back World Cup hundreds with a dab away through third man as he jumps in ecstasy after completing the run. Has been a tremendous effort from him, despite wickets falling from time to time at the other end. Bangladesh need him to stick around as deep as possible in this innings now
now ramps away this short delivery through the vacant third man region to get four more. Really is in some superb form at the moment

a little bit of improvisation from Mahmudullah makes it thee on the trot now as he slams away this fuller one going across him to the deep extra-cover boundary. This was struck away sweetly enough to beat sweeper cover to the rope
make that three in a row as Mitch is having a horror time of it in Hamilton. Slogs away this length delivery on middle and leg behind of square to find the long leg boundary
doesn't need a sighter as he sends this fullish length on and around leg over long leg with a lofted paddle. This partnership is really hurting NZ
and Sabbir's spirited cameo comes to a close as he mistimes this heave through long off, with Brendon finally latching onto a chance to take this with a tumble
slower, back of a length delivery which is glanced away to midwicket
takes the pace off once more as this length delivery is sent screaming away to the man at cow corner, who is in place for it
slower ball which is eased away to the long on region
waits on this slower delivery on middle before striking this one over extra-cover, but crucially, away from the three fielders converging on it in the area
just drives away this fullish length outside his off stump through long off
goes round the wicket as Mahmudullah, who already has 115 to his tally, is able to get low to meet the ball on the full with a paddle that angles this away through fine leg for four
backs away to try and dig out this fuller one through long on, but is unable to connect with the delivery
full delivery, sent across the batsman, as this is drilled away through the covers now
backs away to cream this fuller length ball, but picks out the man at cover in a flash
fires in another wide delivery off the mark which goes through Mahmudullah's leg as he looked for room to flick this away
full delivery, just outside of off, which is sent straight to the cover fielder
tries to keep it well wide of off, but strays the margin
able to get under this fuller delivery as he clears the front leg to send this one sailing over long on for six
now clubs away over to the deep midwicket region to get off the strike

slower delivery which Nasir saw early enough, before deciding to go with the original shot to bottom-edge this high over long off, with the fielder running backwards to try and catch this, but it just got over the rope in the end
Nasir unable to make it two in two as his second attempt ends up slicing over to third man, with Taylor doing well to run backwards and to his right just at the end to claim this
Mahmudullah tries to get Bangladesh past 290, but ends up miscuing this slower length delivery away through mid-off before completing the single
gets some flight outside of off as Guptill rocks forward to defend
looks to steer this one pitched wider of off past mid-off, but fails to do so
now punches away off the back foot, but straight to the bowler
tries to get this away through the covers, but is thwarted by the close-in fielder
tries to force it away once more, but picks out the same fielder
defended on the front foot as Bangladesh begin with a maiden opening over
gets away through third man with an edge off the bat as this one held up on him
backs away to try and cut away the bowler through the covers, but to no avail
dragged a touch as Brendon attacks this one straightaway, pummeling this one over midwicket to find the first boundary of the innings
on the back foot as he played this one back to the bowler
driven solidly down to long off for a single
turns away this one drifted in through the leg side to end the over
defended on the front foot by the batsman
comes down the track before slamming Shakib high over long on for a biggie. NZ will need more of that from Mr. Guptill to make a decent fist of this chase
forward again now to this flighted delivery just outside of off
drifted in the slot as Guptill is able to launch once more over the long on region for half-a-dozen
now looks to get this away square off the wicket on the off side, but fails to do so
short from Shakib, and punished by Guptill as he gets into position quickly to banish this through cow corner
shimmies down the track as Brendon wants a piece of Rubel straightaway. Ends up missing out on this back of a length
dishes out a full toss which is struck away towards long off
able to glance this length delivery away off the pads through midwicket
defends away this length delivery on the off side
looks to get this one away through mid-on, but picks out the fielder

full delivery which strikes the pads of the batsman as Rubel goes up vociferously for the shout. The umpire is not interested, suggesting there perhaps may have been an inside-edge. Bangladesh not interested to pursue the matter any further though as over is called

and Bangladesh have snagged the huge wicket of McCullum as Shakib flights one just outside off, with the bruiser looking to take on long off with another heave, but doesn't quite time it away as this one lands to the fielder in the deep, who is able to take it comfortably. Bangladesh will be might pleased to see the back of him
turns a single onto the leg side to get his tally away
driven away off the back foot quite expertly by Guptill as this is able to just trickle across the extra-cover boundary rope
sensibly drives this next one down to the long off fielder

Bangladesh have just taken another huge wicket as Kane departs from the oval after playing at this one which just holds up on him outside off, with this being sliced over uppishly to Tamim at cover. Shakib has proven the miracle worker with the ball so far. Bangladesh on top in Hamilton!
comes down a touch before presenting a dead straight bat to Shakib
length delivery which is driven on the up through extra-cover. Timed it quite superbly there to get three in the end
short ball which is respected by Taylor off the back foot
bit of shape into the batsman from Rubel as Taylor prods forward, but is pinged high on the pad
jabs away at this short of a length outside his off stump, with the ball eventually fielded around long off
shortish length which is pulled away through deep backward square, with the boundary rider doing well in the end to cut this off before the rope with a dive
shortish length which is glanced away with the angle through square-leg
darts one in on the pads from round the wicket, with this one played away with the angle behind of square
gets away this clip behind of square, running the first one hard enough in order to come back for the second
meets this delivery drifted in from Shakib with a forward defensive stroke
looks to push away now through the covers, but some fine fielding within the circle keeps them to just the single
on the back foot to defend this one flighted in on middle
gets in a good stride before defending this one softly on the off side
shortish length, outside of off, which is punched away through cover, before the close-in fielder put in the dive to intercept
ramps away this shorter ball outside his off stump as this flies over the vacant backward point region to find the boundary
covers the line of this length delivery shaping in on him on middle
short of a length outside of off which is struck away towards the covers
looks to guide this one past point , but the fielder is equal to the task
works away this length delivery outside off through midwicket to keep the strike
flights one in outside of off as this is cut away to point off the back foot
steers away a single through the long on region
tries to dab away a single through third man, but the close-in fielder, around gully, kept him honest
able to get away a clip behind of square as Taylor is able to complete a brace before the throw
defended from the crease towards the leg side
on the front foot as this final ball is fended away softly on the off side
back of a length outside of off which is caressed away with a punch by Guptill. Really timed that beautifully. He is looking ominous here for Bangladesh.
jabs away at this back of a length outside his off stump, but can't quite get it away as he would have liked
runs away this back of a length through third man to get Taylor on strike
shortish length which is fended away off the back foot by the batsman
gets away with this outside edge through third man. Taylor not yet looking the part at the moment
struck away square off the wicket, but can't penetrate the ring
slapped away through the covers, but didn't quite time it off the bat
whips away a single now down to long on
on the front foot as this one is squirted away towards the covers
picks the minute gap at backward point with this late dab that just races away through to the boundary
now punched away deep to long off to move to 49
edges away towards the backward point area, but only succeeds at picking one of the close-in fielders in the vicinity
shortish length which holds up on Guptill as he looked for the glance behind square
shuffles over a touch to his off side before defending this back of a length
picks up the needed single to get to his fifty with a dab-and-run outside his off stump. Met with warm applause from the Hamilton faithful. NZ will want him to press on to greater things now
just works this one away from outside off with a clip to the leg side
edges away this length delivery through third man, with the fielder not picking this initially due to the glare, but is able to respond in time before this threatened to trickle over the rope
full delivery, just outside of off, as this is driven firmly by Guptill to finish off the over in some style
defended from within the confines of his crease
gets on the front foot before executing the drop single to perfection
drags the length a touch as this is short-arm pulled through to deep midwicket
shuffles down before driving inside-out, but straight to the fellow at cover
given just enough room outside his off stump to cut this away late through gully to pickup a useful boundary. That is his first of the innings so far
tries again to cut away, but is lucky not to get an outside edge as he fails to make the connection
short delivery which sits up for Guptill as he pulls this authoritatively through midwicket to just beat the converging fielder on the rope to get four. Brings up their fifty-run stand as well
half-volley on leg stump which catches the pads of Guptill as he runs the leg bye
delivers a steepler, well wide of off, which is called one for the over by the umpire
short again as Taylor this time gets away the pull towards deep midwicket
short of a length which is defended by the batsman on the off side
length delivery haring on the pads which is fended away softly by Guptill
goes round the wicket now as Taylor attempts the paddle through fine leg, but the leg slip in place keeps him humble
fails to get away this punch off the back foot through long on, instead hitting it to the bowler in his follow through
flatter now on leg stump, as this is clipped away to the square-leg fielder
just a touch short, on the same line, as Taylor gets on one knee to slog-sweep this over deep backward square for a boundary
cut away down to deep extra-cover for a comfortable single
squares up Guptill with this which holds up after pitching, with the ball squirting away on the off side in the end
short of a length which is allowed to carry through to the keeper
cuts away through cover, but picks out the fielder
slapped away hard through backward point, and with no fielders in the vicinity, this flies away to the boundary
length delivery on and around off which is defended back to the bowler
fuller length which shapes in a touch as this is guided down to long on
slapped away hard towards point, but is held by the fielder in the end
gets some movement away from outside off as Taylor went hard at it
length delivery, just outside off, as Rosco elects to let it through
tries in vain to slap away through point, but the fielder is all over this
shortish length which climbs on Ross quite awkwardly as he got this away
fuller length, shaping away a touch, as this is defended away on the front foot
fires in a bumper outside of off which secures Rubel a maiden
begins with a length delivery down the pads which is glanced away through fine leg
length delivery just outside of off which is defended away by the batsman
punches away this back of a length through long on, with Ross calling early to get through for the single
steered away through long on now for a comfortable single
content to just turn this one away on the on side
clips away this length delivery to the close-in fielder on the leg side to end the over

manages to induce the outside edge of Guptill's bat, but this falls sharply away from Mushfiqur's outstretched right hand as he went for the dive, with this continuing on through third man for four. No feet movement there for Guptill, but four runs all the same
now jabbed away through the covers to get to the other end
guides away now square off the wicket, but is held by the point fielder
defended away off the back foot as Rubel picks this up in his follow through
steered down towards long off, but can't pinch the run
slices away this back of a length which is delivered wide of off, with this flying over through backward point to beat the fielder from third man to the rope
cuts away this back of a length well wide of off, with this one going to the deep cover fielder in the end
tries to get away a run on the off side, but hits it a bit too well to the cover fielder
turns away a single on the leg side to get off the strike
shortish length which is driven away towards mid-off off the back foot
tries to force away a drive through the covers, but mistimes the stroke
punched away square off the wicket now to end the over
cuts away this one turning away on off, picking out the man at deep extra-cover
just about gets away this jab through the covers as he steamed down to the other end
slapped away hard now to the man at deep extra-cover
looks to ease this one past point, but the fielder is all over it
tries to force away a drive through mid-off, but the fielder keeps him humble
unable to finish the over on a high as he is punished for dropping this last one a touch short, and wide for Ross to get the late cut away through the gap at third man
defended away on the front foot by Guptill, who has looked to have slowed down here a bit
pushed back to the bowler in his follow through
was looking to scythe this fuller one away through the covers before miscuing this more towards long on
pulls this short ball into the ground as this finished up somewhere near deep midwicket
eased away off the back foot through long on as the batsmen exchange ends
able to get away a single through mid-off as he hared down to the non-striker's
tries to get this one past a diving Sabbir, but the bowler is able to win that battle
now steers away this one drifting in on middle and leg, through long on
strikes away this one dug in just outside of off as this lands somewhere near extra-cover

a touch quicker now as the pace allows Ross to cut this late through third man to bring up 5000 ODI runs. Fourth NZ player after Fleming, Astle and Brendon to get to the mark. Taylor also the fastest of all of them to get there
content to just guide this next one down to long off
defends this last delivery to end a memorable over for Rosco
defends away this length delivery towards the mid-on region
defended back to the bowler by Ross
tries to slap away past the point fielder, with the man putting in a fine dive to keep Ross to just one
sends down a leg-side wide which Guptill looked to power away through long leg, but was late on it

plenty of width, and at a fullish length, as this is smacked away hard by Guptill to short cover, who looked in pain as he attempted to field that one. Still on the ground as he ponders over alternative career options. "M.A.S.H." theme playing now over the ground. Someone get Hawkeye!
overpitched and in the slot as Guptill accepts this gratefully, blazing away a drive which had even the cameraman unsure as it rocketed to the extra-cover boundary
just gets away with this streaky edge through third man which is collected before the rope
begins round the wicket as this slightly short length is glanced away through square-leg
tries to get at this leg-side ball which spins away outside leg
looks to turn it away on the leg side, but can't pick the vacant space
this time eases away the run, just behind of square, to get off the strike
just guides this past the short backward square with a flick, but can't penetrate the long leg boundary
given some width across him to work with, which he does superbly as he cuts away powerfully through the covers to move to 94

looking to target the vacant space at fine leg with this sweep round the corner, but gets a top-edge which had short backward square in play for a little while, before it just got over him. All of NZ's collective breath would have been held, but he survives
gets away a single through the covers to bring back Guptill on strike
defended away off the back foot, but straight to the mid-off fielder
crashes away this back of a length square off the wicket to get within three runs of a century
steers away a run straight to mid-off, before deciding to take on his throwing arm. Wins the battle in the end, despite the call being perhaps a touch late
defended away off the back foot towards the covers
defends away this length delivery now to end the over
flights this one from round the wicket as Taylor eases a single down to long on
slams this leg-side delivery through backward square, but finds the boundary rider right away. If he had struck that just a couple of metres either side, it would have been a certain boundary
negotiates this one drifting in from leg
comes down the track to this tossed up on leg, with this one striking Taylor's pads as it squirted away to the leg side
works away a single now square off the wicket

waits on this one to slide down as he glances it away behind of square. As he was coming down to the other end though, he exclaims loudly, and then hobbles the last few paces. The crowd are hushed as they think there is something seriously wrong with the batsman. After a few moments though, it becomes abundantly clear that the opener is just suffering a bout of cramps. Takes my memory back to Mark Richardson's incident when he went down like he had been shot in a Test against India, circa 2002, if I am not mistaken

Guptill brings up a maiden World Cup ton as he pumps his fist to acknowledge this outpouring of love from this Hamilton crowd. Has been a wonderful knock under pressure, but there is still plenty left to do here. NZ will be mighty buoyed to have him up and firing again
eases away a single off the back foot through fine leg
drives this one away towards the man at short cover
short of a length which is defended away towards the off side
shortish length which is creamed away to deep extra-cover, but not sublimely enough for this to reach the rope
full delivery which is guided down to long on to end the over
slides one down on leg which Guptill fails to get the sweep away to
cut away now square off the wicket as sweeper cover comes into play
punched away now towards mid-off, but can't pinch the single
slides one down on the pads as this is tucked away quite comfortably on the leg side
now guided down to long on off the back foot
driven away to the off side now to end the over
just eases this one away on the pads through square-leg
drifts one in on the pads once more, as this is played back to him in his follow through
defended away from within the confines of his crease
steered away off the back foot to run this down towards long on
forces one away to the man at long on
tries to dab one through third man now, but is held by the close-in fielder
defends this one drifted in towards the off side
flatter, and faster along the same trajectory, as Guptill does well to fend this away
tries to run it past backward point, but picks him out instead

Shakib makes another vital breakthrough for Bangladesh as Guptill has to go after trying to clear the long on fielder, but ends up holing out to hm. Rubel was the catcher there. Has been an excellent century to give his team a platform from which to take Bangladesh on
defended away very carefully by Elliott, who is mindful of all the close-in fielders
now shows his experience by forcing away a sweep through the gap between short leg and leg slip that finds the fine leg boundary in a hurry
jabbed away off the back foot as this one lands up eventually at deep extra-cover
rocks forward before playing the dab-and-run outside his off stump to perfection
on the front foot and defended away softly by the batsman
given plenty of flight as this one is steered down to long off
nicely on the front foot as he sees out this one drifting in, before straightening on off stump
tucks this one away off the back foot, but straight to the silly mid-on fielder in place
tossed up just outside of off as this is driven straight to Shakib in his follow through
cut away to the off side as Elliott wanted the run, but is sent back by Taylor
negotiated by Taylor safely on the off side
this time waits on the back foot, but is unable to force it through any vacant space

and he gets a much-needed World Cup fifty with a squirt away on the off side. Has been a laboured knock, but one his country needed him to play. He will be looked upon now to see NZ through as we enter into the business end of things
driven away firmly through long off to retain the strike
Elliott on the back foot as he punches this away to point
nurdles this one on the leg side, but can't penetrate the gap
defends this one away softly on the off side
drags the length now as Elliott makes him pay, getting into position quickly to slam this over cow corner for a boundary
sensibly tries to guide one away now for a single through the covers, but is held by silly mid-off
flights one in on and around off as Elliott looked to dab it away, but plays just outside of the line as it went through to the keeper
shortish length, going down the leg side, as this is glanced away through square-leg
notes the space between the squarish third man and slip, and picks the gap by opening the face to this slightly back of a length outside his off stump, which just races away to the third man boundary
tries to crash away one through the covers, but doesn't quite time it so
turned away off the pads now through midwicket as the pair complete a brace
goes for the lofted pull through cow corner, as there are no fielders in the deep, but didn't time this heave away off the short ball
overpitched outside of off, and with no one in the deep on the off side, Elliott punishes him with a drive that just races to the deep cover boundary
dabs away a run to short third man
tries to force away a drive off the back foot, but is held by the close-in fielder
gets it away now to the boundary rider at sweeper cover
tries to guide this one past point, but no can do
cuts away this one spinning outside of off, with this one landing around sweeper cover
able to sneak a quick single through the same region, despite the pressure from the throw at the striker's end
fails to get away this steer through gully as he played off the back foot
sends in a quick delivery which is dead-batted in the end by Elliott as he looked to dab it away fine through third man
looking to get this over through third man, but is late on this back of a length which gets good carry to the keeper
defended on the front foot, but straight to the man at backward point
half-volley, outside of off, which is dug away towards long off
full, swinging delivery, which is drilled straight to mid-off
gets this one to spin away sharply outside of off, with Elliott late on the ball
gets quickly on the back foot when he sees this fractionally short, sending this away with a short-arm pull through midwicket
now targets the vacant space at long leg with a powerful sweep, that races away unhindered to the boundary
this time looks for the slog-sweep through square-leg, with Taskin doing well initially before tumbling over. Thankfully, the ball stays close to him
picks up a single through square-leg
tries to steer one past the man at mid-off as Taijul's ten-over spell comes to a close
able to dab away a single to third man to get off the hot seat
fires in a length delivery which is directed away behind of square by the batsman
shortish length which has him on the back foot as this is fended away on the off side
another one which he looked to run down through third man, but is late on as this continues through to the keeper

Rubel has struck as Elliott goes chasing after this wider, fullish length, slicing away to Taskin at sweeper cover, who has to dive slightly forward to claim it. Ends an important knock from Elliott as he tried to up the rate a touch

strikes Anderson above the knee roll, and perhaps down leg, as Rubel bounces in his follow through, thinking he may have got his man, before he is brought back to earth with a dismissive nod from the umpire
tosses one up on off which is struck away to him in his follow through
worked away to the close-in fielder on the leg side now
drifting a touch down leg as Taylor is able to get this through to square-leg
gets in a good stride to meet this flighted delivery from round the wicket
once again has to defend it back to the bowler after being sent in slightly round-arm from the bowler
just fends away this one sliding down leg on the on side
short of a length which is defended away to the off side by Ross
gets appreciable bounce and carry to this shorter ball flung in outside of off. Taylor was looking to send this one over third man with a slice
width given outside his off stump as Ross targets the squarish third man region with a scythe, but is held by some good work from the boundary rider
fuller length which is struck back to the bowler in his follow through
easy as you like as he sends this Taskin length delivery straight back over his head with the cleanest of blows. Anderson announces himself with that stroke to the Hamilton crowd
slipping down the leg side as Taskin feels a bit of pressure after that last bludgeon
on-the-up drive which he mistimes completely, finding the mid-off fielder as a consequence
darts one in on middle which is tucked away to the leg side

Ross looking to slog-sweep this over cow corner as he is struck in front of middle and leg. Looked as plumb as they get, with Ross initially walking off before Corey intervened. Ross decides to go for the review. Quite a waste of a review DRS confirms this indeed was going on to hit timber. The only thing now is NZ are down a review as they enter this crucial period of the match. May come back to hurt them later...
on the front foot to this one tossed up just outside off stump
Ronchi straight into the action as he powers away this dragged length over the cow corner boundary. Met with huge relief and applause from the Hamilton crowd
just tucks away this one sliding in on the pads
nudges away the ball onto the leg side to end a successful over for Bangladesh
defends this short of a length back to the bowler, who picks it up in his delivery stride
short ball and dismissed from Anderson's presence as he powers this away with a pull through backward square
loopy, slower ball which is dug away to the man at long on
just guides this one to the right of Taskin as he ushers in Corey for the run
pitched up and drilled brutally by Anderson through long off, with mid-off not even featuring in this fruitless chase to the boundary
continues round the wicket as he slants across a short of a length, wide delivery down the leg side, which is penalised by the umpire
slower, length delivery which gets the outside edge as Anderson slightly rushed the stroke. Ends up rolling down to third man in the end
flatter delivery which doesn't quite bounce on Anderson as he defended to the bowler
now tucks away a run through the long on region to get to the other end
delivers one which raps the pads on and around leg, with the umpire almost looking to give it out, but deciding against it
sweeps this one on the same line, hard to the man at short backward square
defends away this quicker one darted in just outside of off
Ronchi puts away the only bad ball of the over, and quite mercilessly. Just slogged it away through deep midwicket to split the two fielders
starts from round the wicket as he tosses one up for Anderson to smash well over the cow corner boundary. Just sailed so high into the night air, before descending from the heavens
darts in a quicker one on off which is dug out to the bowler, who snaps it up in his follow through
now drills away this flatter one on the pads to long on

Shakib strikes for the fourth time today, and again in the first over of a spell, as Ronchi looked to take on the deep extra-cover by hitting wide of him, but probably should have gone straight back down as he ends up holing out to the fielder in the region. Helps to redress the scales somewhat as we get into the final portion of the innings
and straight away gets off the mark with a single through long on to get Corey back on strike
spoons away this attempted paddle over long leg, getting this instead over square-leg, but most importantly, away from any fielders
continues from round the wicket as this is slapped away towards mid-off. Plenty of chatter from Mushfiqur as he questions why the fielder was on the back foot
fails to get away a single on the leg side
tries to open the face to guide one past the slip, but no can do
Vettori sweeps this one sliding in on middle and leg, and picks the gap at deep midwicket with a powerful sweep
now glances away rather uppishly through the same region, with Corey handed the strike as a consequence

gets away with this attempted sweep round the corner as the ball spoons high over as a result of catching the edge, but lands safely in the end around where short fine leg would have stood traditionally. Nasir has hands on his heads, and Bangladesh rue a very, very close chance
drags the length, with this turning away, as Vettori just flat-bats this straight past Mahmudullah to find the long off boundary
now shovels over a run towards long on
flighted well wide of off, and turning away, as this is slashed to the fielder at point, who is able to dissuade the notion of quick single from the NZ batsmen

dropped. That moment may come back to haunt Bangladesh. Nasir makes a fabulous effort to try and reach this top-edge from Vettori's bat that flies high over to mid-on. The fielder is able to race across, put in the dive, but fails at the last stage in keeping it under control. Really terrific effort, but in matches like this, they need to be taken
now tries to force away a cut through the covers, but is held well by the man inside of the ring
swats this one dragged wide outside of off straight back past the bowler's right, who tried to avoid/catch it. This one ends up at long off, with Anderson retaining the strike

make that 20 off 17 as Anderson sends this dragged length high over the man at long on. There is a one-handed catch in the crowd from the man in the orange target shirt. Can't get anymore sweeter for him could it?

Nasir has the last laugh though as he rocks this Hamilton crowd into silence with a slightly quicker, flatter delivery that castle Anderson after he looked for the almighty heave over midwicket. Nasir lets out a roar of approval, and New Zealand now go seven down, with a big wicket back in the shed
tosses one up outside of off which is played away to the off side, but the run cannot be taken
a touch short as Southee is able to whip this away through long leg to get off the strike

backs away to the leg side before drilling this one straight to the fielder at deep extra-cover. They hustle as hard as possible to come back for the second, with a throw from the deep threatening to have him run out, but misses the mark

backs away again as Vettori has lifted the spirits of the Hamilton faithful with this graceful, inside-out lofted stroke that just passes over the clutches of deep extra-cover in the deep. Massive relief across this ground after it sailed over, as there was a period where he looked to be holing out like the rest before
eases away a single down to long on to get Vettori back on strike
advances down before driving this away through long on for a single
sends one in that is both wide and short, but all Southee can do is carve this straight to the cover fielder inside of the ring
Southee may not have done much with the ball today, but he has certainly done the job for NZ here as he lifts this one tossed up over long off, as this just sailed over for half-a-dozen
now chops away this one pitched on off stump to get it just past the point fielder, and away to the boundary to bring a famous victory to NZ
